entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is Hagrid's half-brother. He is mentioned as someone they would have been teaching how to tie his shoelaces if they had stayed.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper and a teacher at Hogwarts. Hermione misses talking to him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's best friends. She is upset about not being able to talk to Hagrid.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main protagonist and a student at Hogwarts. He is popular and interesting.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's best friends. He thinks they are better off without Grawp in their lives.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are close friends.
Harry and Ron are close friends.
Ron does not want Grawp in their lives.
